title: 1-2 second freezes in game since big windows 10 update
body:
Hey guys, I just recently decided to allow windows 10 to do that big anniversary update. Ever since then, I've been getting random 1-2 seconds full on freezing while playing league of legends. It only occurs while playing LoL, no issues with any other games. I have a powerhouse pc so I know its not a hardware issue. The freezes occur usually once at the most twice during an entire game, and generally last no longer than 2 seconds. If anyone else has been having this issue and knows a fix, I'd greatly appreciate it.

Thanks, Simo

replies.body: A recent Windows 10 update caused the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) game bar to not play well with League.  Disabling this should get the freezing fixed up.  Let me know if you still continue to have issues, though!

Thanks for the tip! I'll give it a try.

EDIT:
I guess this wasn't the problem for me, the game bar was already turned off.

There could be other factors here like outdated drivers or possible hardware issues.  As an additional step, go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide and follow each step to tune up your PC.  Let me know your results if you still have any issues.
Well I've run a system cleaner program and for the few games I've played since then things have been running fine. Hopefully that solved it.
Uninstall updates ez fix fuck microsoft

Mine also did a complete freeze with frozen audio in ARAM. My only solution was to do a hard computer restart and I missed most of a game (and returned to an angry response). I played again and was okay for whatever reason. Later today I tried to do a custom two v two with friends and froze twice upon entering the map. Hopefully this gets fixed soon.
Mine just freezes entirely and the audio will keep repeating the last sound it last made. Then I will see a notice that says lol is trying to acess my graphic hardware

I've been having a similar issue since the windows 10 update but in my case the game will start freezing with around 3 second intervals and then my pc will black screen, and the only way to get out of it is to force shutdown. Haven't found any solutions myself either :/
